00028 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00029 #include "kvi_string.h"
00030 #include "kvi_pointerlist.h"
00031 
00032 #include <QObject>
00033 
00034 class KviIrcConnection;
00035 
00036 class KviLagCheck
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         KviStr szKey;
00040         long   lSecs;  // since epoch
00041         long   lUSecs;
00042         unsigned int    uReliability; // [0-100]
00043 };
00044 
00045 class KVIRC_API KviLagMeter : public QObject
00046 {
00047         Q_OBJECT
00048         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00049 protected:
00050         KviLagMeter(KviIrcConnection * c);
00051         ~KviLagMeter();
00052 protected:
00053         KviIrcConnection        * m_pConnection;
00054         unsigned int              m_uLag;                // last computed lag
00055         unsigned int              m_uLastEmittedLag;     // last emitted lag
00056         long                      m_tLastCompleted;      // time when the last lag was completed (gettimeofday!)
00057         unsigned int              m_uLastReliability;    // how much reliable was the last completed check ?
00058         KviPointerList<KviLagCheck> * m_pCheckList;
00059         long                      m_tFirstOwnCheck;      // time when the first ping after a completed check was sent
00060         long                      m_tLastOwnCheck;       // time when the last ping was sent
00061         bool                      m_bOnAlarm;
00062         bool                    * m_pDeletionSignal;     // we use this to signal our own delete
00063 public:
00064         // lag checks should be done only against the user's server
00065         // please make SURE that the key is unique!
00066         void lagCheckRegister(const char * key,unsigned int uReliability = 50);
00067         bool lagCheckComplete(const char * key);
00068         void lagCheckAbort(const char * key);
00069         unsigned int lag(){ return m_uLag; };
00070         unsigned int secondsSinceLastCompleted();
00071 protected:
00072         virtual void timerEvent(QTimerEvent * e);
00073 };
